short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to merge branches in Gitlab fast and easy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Merge your Gitlab branches in your Browser.

This is an open-source extension for merging the branches with a few clicks.

The extension fetches repository status and simulates creating merge request and merge operation in Gitlab.

You can use this extension for your self-host Gitlab Instance.
